name: defi-protocol-subgraph
description: This package contains subgraph DeFi protocols that opty.fi's earn protocol integrates natively
author: Opty-Fi <info@opty.fi>

scripts.prepare:subgraph: yarn subgraph:mustache && graph codegen --output-dir ./generated && graph build
scripts.subgraph:deploy: node ./src/grantAuth.js && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opty-fi/defi-protocol-subgraph
scripts.subgraph:deploy:local: graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ opty-fi/defi-protocol-subgraph && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001/ opty-fi/defi-protocol-subgraph
